title: FREE Plant-Based Raw Food Demo
desc: - At the event, we will be selling our? Delicious Healthy Vegan, Gluten-free Foods & RAW Desserts. -? You will get to try a FREE Sample size of " CARUBIES " which will be on sale at this event- "CARUBIES" are Vegan, Gluten-Free treats which have No Sugar/Preservatives/Color added. - 3-4  ?Raw Plant-Based? dishes will be prepared before you - ? You will get a ?FREE Sample Size?of each Food? item? prepared before you!! -? ?A Lively Short? Health Lecture ?will be presented to you, on how to take care of your bodies with simple and natural remedies.? - This is a Kid/Family friendly event. - We will be filming/taking photos during this event. If you don't wish to be included in the the video/photos at our event, feel free to let our volunteers know. - Please RSVP for exact number of tickets/Seats you require and if for some reason you are unable to attend our event, cancel/adjust your RSVP.? www.HeidisHealthKitchen.com www.Facebook.com/HeidisHealthKitchen
